subject: ORDER #SSN4146
description_text:
I received one box.  It included the pedals, controller, springs and
bushings but NO base plate.

 

Please advise asap.

 

Thanks

 

John

 

John Meglen

 

218-780-4058

conversations.body_text: Hi John,    We sincerely apologize for the delay caused by the shortage of floor stock in our U.S. warehouse. We will ship your order immediately upon receiving the item today.
